title: Irwin Cotler to receive the 2015 Scotiabank Ethical Leadership Award (Dalhousie University)
text: ( Source : Dalhousie University ) A champion of human rights who has been Canada's minister of justice and attorney general, a law professor at at McGill University and an international human rights lawyer will receive the third annual
